titles.title: A bill for the relief of Charles Carney.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/28/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual, a former Member of the House of Representatives, for legal fees incurred when he was indicted, tried, and acquitted on charges of misusing public funds.
